---
title: "Bio"
---

Amelia Wands is a second-year student from Buffalo, New York, enrolled at Baldwin Wallace University. She is double majoring in Data Science and Finance, with a minor in Statistics, and is also in the Honors Program.

Wands is a tutor for the Center for Academic Success and Achievement. She is also an athlete on Baldwin Wallace's swimming and diving team.

In her free time, Wands enjoys reading, watching movies, and hanging out with family and friends.
